attributes.action: Make UK roads (specifically country roads) more wide
attributes.additional_details: It will minimise crashes and deaths from car crashes.
attributes.background: The roads are very small and it is hard to get around, if you have a big lorry and your driving through the country then it will be very hard especially if there are other driver coming. Also when it's a 1 lane road then it could be dangerous and crashes could happen.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We could allow a petition asking the government to provide funding to widen all single lane roads to at least two lanes, if that is what you want to happen.
